name: Colors!Hit Switch Run
description:
This Game is a trial and error (where you have to reset game) with color Switch giving you a colorful and fun experience. It also Takes another theme from BYOG 2021 "Two Views"

There is Tutorial that will tell the rules!

Controls :

A & D - Move 

Left Click - Shoot Ball

R - Reset the Level

Number " 1 " - Toggle Speed

" Enter " - Move Next Level (After Getting the Star)
